presets.name: Rising Bubbles
presets.css: .sky{position:fixed;inset:0;overflow:hidden;background:#0b0b12} .b{position:absolute;bottom:-80px;width:var(--s);height:var(--s);border-radius:50%;background:radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(255,255,255,.8), rgba(255,255,255,.1));left:var(--x);animation:rise var(--t) linear infinite;opacity:.8}@keyframes rise{to{transform:translateY(-120vh)}}

presets.name: Errl SVG Playground
presets.html: <svg id="errl" viewBox="0 0 300 300" width="300"><circle cx="150" cy="150" r="120" fill="#8a5cff"/><circle cx="120" cy="130" r="12"/><circle cx="180" cy="130" r="12"/><rect x="130" y="170" rx="8" ry="8" width="40" height="16"/></svg>
